entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (6)20150901
I fought the Blood-starved Beast and beat it on the third try. The
first time I got to the third phase of the battle but died. The
second time I did much worse. And the third time I used the bell
and brought an NPC into the battle. We did it and it was pretty
awesome to use that guy as a decoy. It was an awesome fight.

I explored the other area that got unlocked back at the Cathedral
Ward, but died falling down a big hole.

TODO Go back to Old Yharnum and kill the Gatling guy, then get the
stuff by the hunter.

Total time: 10:59
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 18 - The Turtle Hermit Way
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 18 - The Turtle Hermit Way20150901
This was a fun sequence because it reminds me of lots of kung-fu
movies where the trainee has to do some other thing that builds
up to their physical perfection. I think it was best when Goku
was able to move the rock already and when they had to put the
turtle shells on their backs.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 19 - The Tournament Begins
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 19 - The Tournament Begins20150901
I like their uniforms and the way they jumped super high when
they took off their second round of turtle shells. It's so weird
that Launch had no character development or plot related to her
at all.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 20 - Elimination Round
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 20 - Elimination Round20150901
It's so cool how tough they realize that they are. I love that a
tiny little tap knocks the giant guy out of the ring. And we
thought Goku was strong before!
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (5)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (5)20150831
I played today for about an hour and went through most of Old
Yharnum. I unlocked two short-cuts and now I can get down to the
bottom faster without having to go through the gatling gun guy.

Total time: 9:23

value in searching for the stone and having a competition about
it.

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (4)20150829
I played for a bit and explored most of the Cathedral Ward and
made my way to Old Yharnam. The game is very nerve-wracking. The
old town is very strangely organized and I get bad performance
from the engine while walking around. I've done quite a bit of
upgrading of all my stuff. I like the speed of the Kirkhammer when
it is not in hammer mode.

Total time: 8:34
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 8 - The Kamehameha Wave
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 8 - The Kamehameha Wave20150828
It is very silly that the Bansho fan was carelessly thrown
out. I'm surprised that Chichi and the Ox King are just gone from
the story. I like that Goku does a baby wave on the first try.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.content:

be forced to live on the moon and make marshmallows!

entry.title: Movie: Project Almanac, starring Jonny Weston (2015)
entry.content:
Movie: Project Almanac, starring Jonny Weston (2015)20150828
I did not have big expectations for this movie, but was very
impressed and loved the story. I thought the acting and personal
interest was pretty cool, as did I like the sciency side of it.
  • Movies
  • 2015

entry.title: Book: Storm Front, by Jim Butcher (2000) (2)
entry.content:
Book: Storm Front, by Jim Butcher (2000) (2)20150828
This was a really cool book. I think what I liked the best was that
magic was presented as very messy and uncontrollable, but Dresden
was presented as such a great expert that he was a master of that
power. I thought the fights at the end were very exciting and
worked really well. I'm excited to read more of the series.
  • Books
  • 2000

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Oolong the Terrible
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Oolong the Terrible20150825
This is such a silly episode. I like that it ends up being a
goofy pig. It is also cute that Goku doesn't actually hurt people
if he doesn't have to, but just chases Oolong.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Yamcha the Desert Bandit
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Yamcha the Desert Bandit20150825
It's very strange that Oolong is suddenly in the group. He
provides another comic relief character that is silly in a
different way from Bulma and Goku. Yamcha is interesting because
he's the first one that can actually hurt Goku and where Goku
needs to fight a bit.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball
